net.sourceforge.cilib.Domain
Class Compound

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.cilib.Domain.DomainComponent
      net.sourceforge.cilib.Domain.Vector
          net.sourceforge.cilib.Domain.Compound
public class Compound
extends Vector

This class can be used to represent domains of the form C^N where C is another domain component and N is an integer representing the dimension of this component. A special case is where N is the character 'N' which represents an unkown or unbounded dimension.

Author:
espeer
